COMM: Like millions of people around the world

Mark Dumas loves nothing more than to take
a swim. But for him there is a rather massive
difference as Mark swims with a polar bear.

title: The Only Man In The World Who Can Swim With A Polar Bear: Grizzly Man

comments.author: Segeb Gaming

comments.text:
This is a very well *trained* bear, not a domesticated one. It takes 
thousands of years over many generations to domesticate a species. That 
means this bear is *technically* wild and still has its wild instincts. The 
bear could inflict serious injury or death simply off a display of 
dominance.
That being said I'm sure this guy understands and has accepted the risks. 
He loves his bear and ain't nothing wrong with that!﻿
